rooms.name: Entrance & Living Area
rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance and living space with a spacious area to welcome guests.

rooms.name: Open Lounge
rooms.description: Spacious lounge area designed for relaxation and entertainment, featuring modern amenities.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchenette integrated with the living area for a bachelor pad style.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom attached to the lounge area.

openings.description: A large door designed with Vastu principles in mind for positive energy flow, ensuring a welcoming approach.
Large windows to promote natural light and maintain the balance of elements per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony door for easy access to outdoor space, providing a connection with nature.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed for comfort and luxury, incorporating elements of modern design.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym integrated within the duplex layout to support a healthy lifestyle.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: Dedicated space for work or study, ensuring balance between professional and personal life.

openings.description: Large window to allow maximum natural light, enhancing the workspace atmosphere.
Access door leading out to a private balcony for relaxation and fresh air.
